item.title: Creating My Site
item.description: I bought my first domain through Google Domains and actually hosted my site through Google’s website builder. It really is a great free builder with solid SEO, but I’m a programmer, so I wanted to program. Distributed networks are an amazing technology, and I was drawn to IPFS hosting.
